item.title: Showtime is set to campaign Sophie Nélisse for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Drama Series for ‘YELLOWJACKETS’ season 2.

item.title:
‘FANTASTIC 4’ reportedly begins filming in January 2024.

item.title:
Jonah Hauer-King says “Halle Bailey is just extraordinary.”
“She is so talented. She carries the weight of this film [THE LITTLE MERMAID] on her shoulders so gracefully. She was an incredible friend to me, both in front of and behind the camera. People will be amazed by her.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Jennifer Lawrence on choosing a theatrical release instead of streaming for her upcoming film ‘NO HARD FEELINGS’:
“I look much better 12 feet high.”

item.author: FilmUpdates
